name: The Manor - Haunted House Pack - Unreal Engine (UE4)
name_original: The Manor - Haunted House Pack - Unreal Engine (UE4)
description:
THE MANOR - HAUNTED HOUSE PACK

A fully furnished, abandoned and dark Manor is the perfect beginning for an horror story.

Discover hundreds of objects and creepy details hidden in every corner of this haunted house.  Game-Ready  right out of the box.

What's in the pack:

  • 109 Unique Objects
  • 800 Total Objects
  • 525 Textures ( 2K, 4K and 8K Version )
  • PBR Materials

Available Formats:

  • Unreal Engine (UE4)
